sentences.en: The ICC must decide whether to indict the suspects.
sentences.cn: 国际刑事法庭必须决定是否起诉这些嫌犯。

sentences.en: Their decisions on whether to indict someone have mostly been unappealable.
sentences.cn: 他们是否起诉犯罪嫌疑人的决定大部分情况下都是不可上诉的。

sentences.en: Prosecutors said they wouldn't indict Mr. Hatoyama due to insufficient evidence.
sentences.cn: 检察官说因为证据不足，不会起诉鸠山由纪夫。
